trans-unit.source: Restore Data on a Windows Server

seg-source.mrk: Restore Data on a Windows Server

target.mrk: Restaurer des données sur un serveur Windows

trans-unit.source: This section describes several methods to restore data, as well as how to perform these methods in graphic mode and CLI mode.

seg-source.mrk: This section describes several methods to restore data, as well as how to perform these methods in graphic mode and CLI mode.

target.mrk: Cette section décrit plusieurs méthodes de restauration des données, ainsi que la manière d'effectuer ces méthodes en mode graphique et en mode CLI.

trans-unit.source: Restore Methods

seg-source.mrk: Restore Methods

target.mrk: Méthodes de restauration

trans-unit.source: Check the following methods to restore your data (<MadCap:xref href="#snapshots_restore_data_methods" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: Check the following methods to restore your data (<MadCap:xref href="#snapshots_restore_data_methods" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Vérifiez les méthodes suivantes pour restaurer vos données (<MadCap:xref href="#snapshots_restore_data_methods" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) :

trans-unit.source: Methods to restore data

seg-source.mrk: Methods to restore data

target.mrk: Méthodes de restauration des données

trans-unit.source: Restore Method

seg-source.mrk: Restore Method

target.mrk: Méthode de restauration

trans-unit.source: When to use

seg-source.mrk: When to use

target.mrk: Quand l'utiliser

trans-unit.source: Advantages

seg-source.mrk: Advantages

target.mrk: Avantages

trans-unit.source: Disadvantages

seg-source.mrk: Disadvantages

target.mrk: Inconvénients

trans-unit.source: Linking a snapshot.

seg-source.mrk: Linking a snapshot.

target.mrk: Lier un snapshot.

trans-unit.source: This can be done via:

seg-source.mrk: This can be done via:

target.mrk: Ceci peut être fait avec :

trans-unit.source: GUI

seg-source.mrk: GUI

target.mrk: GUI

trans-unit.source: CLI

seg-source.mrk: CLI

target.mrk: CLI

trans-unit.source: When the server has been installed on the system disk.

seg-source.mrk: When the server has been installed on the system disk.

target.mrk: Lorsque le serveur a été installé sur le disque système.

trans-unit.source: The snapshot is linked to a directory you can browse for directories and files to restore individually.

seg-source.mrk: The snapshot is linked to a directory you can browse for directories and files to restore individually.

target.mrk: Le snapshot est lié à un répertoire que vous pouvez parcourir pour rechercher des répertoires et des fichiers à restaurer individuellement.

trans-unit.source: You must have enough space to copy the files to restore.

seg-source.mrk: You must have enough space to copy the files to restore.

target.mrk: Vous devez disposer de suffisamment d'espace pour copier les fichiers à restaurer.

trans-unit.source: Reverting a snapshot.

seg-source.mrk: Reverting a snapshot.

target.mrk: Effectuer un revert d'un snapshot.

trans-unit.source: When you need to restore the entire content of the snapshot.

seg-source.mrk: When you need to restore the entire content of the snapshot.

target.mrk: Lorsque vous devez restaurer l'intégralité du contenu du snapshot.

trans-unit.source: This method is fast and easy.

seg-source.mrk: This method is fast and easy.

target.mrk: Cette méthode est rapide et facile.

trans-unit.source: It does not require additional disk space for the restore.

seg-source.mrk: It does not require additional disk space for the restore.

target.mrk: Elle ne nécessite pas d'espace disque supplémentaire pour la restauration.

trans-unit.source: There is no granularity, you restore the disk as a whole.

seg-source.mrk: There is no granularity, you restore the disk as a whole.

target.mrk: Il n'y a pas de granularité, vous restaurez le disque dans son ensemble.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this method on system disks and on disks containing a page file.

seg-source.mrk: You cannot use this method on system disks and on disks containing a page file.

target.mrk: Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser cette méthode sur les disques système et sur les disques contenant un page file.

trans-unit.source: Restore Best Practice

seg-source.mrk: Restore Best Practice

target.mrk: Bonnes pratiques de restauration

trans-unit.source: These are the best practices to restore your data:

seg-source.mrk: These are the best practices to restore your data:

target.mrk: Voici les bonnes pratiques pour restaurer vos données :

trans-unit.source: You should always restore individual items using snapshot linking before attempting a revert.

seg-source.mrk: You should always restore individual items using snapshot linking before attempting a revert.

target.mrk: Vous devez toujours restaurer des éléments individuels à l'aide de la liaison de snapshots avant de tenter un revert.

trans-unit.source: You should always restore items from the same snapshot session to make sure that all elements are consistent.

seg-source.mrk: You should always restore items from the same snapshot session to make sure that all elements are consistent.

target.mrk: Vous devez toujours restaurer les éléments de la même session de snapshot pour vous assurer que tous les éléments sont cohérents.

trans-unit.source: Use Revert only if the entire snapshot need to be restored.

seg-source.mrk: Use Revert only if the entire snapshot need to be restored.

target.mrk: N'utilisez le revert que si l'intégralité du snapshot a besoin d'être restaurée.

trans-unit.source: You cannot revert if on the volume, parts of the page file or other system files are present.

seg-source.mrk: You cannot revert if on the volume, parts of the page file or other system files are present.

target.mrk: Vous ne pouvez pas effectuer un revert si des parties du file page ou d'autres fichiers système sont présents sur le volume.

trans-unit.source: Link a VSS Snapshot to a Directory in Graphical Mode

seg-source.mrk: Link a VSS Snapshot to a Directory in Graphical Mode

target.mrk: Lier un snapshot VSS à un répertoire en mode graphique

trans-unit.source: Right-click a drive in Windows Explorer and select Properties.

seg-source.mrk: Right-click a drive in Windows Explorer and select Properties.

target.mrk: Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur un lecteur dans l'Explorateur Windows et sélectionnez Propriétés.

trans-unit.source: The Shadow Copies tab displays the snapshots that have been taken. In the Previous Versions tab, you can mount (open) the snapshot.

seg-source.mrk: The Shadow Copies tab displays the snapshots that have been taken.
In the Previous Versions tab, you can mount (open) the snapshot.

target.mrk: L'onglet Shadow Copies affiche les snapshots qui ont été effectués.
Dans l'onglet Previous Versions, vous pouvez monter (ouvrir) le snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Select a snapshot and click Open to mount it.

seg-source.mrk: Select a snapshot and click Open to mount it.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez un snapshot et cliquez sur Open pour le monter.

trans-unit.source: Browse this directory for the required files and directories and restore them to the original disk.

seg-source.mrk: Browse this directory for the required files and directories and restore them to the original disk.

target.mrk: Parcourez ce répertoire pour trouver les fichiers et répertoires requis et restaurez-les sur le disque d'origine.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the method you choose, after a restore of your server, you need to manually remove the file db_backup_sync located in the database path.

seg-source.mrk: Regardless of the method you choose, after a restore of your server, you need to manually remove the file db_backup_sync located in the database path.

target.mrk: Quelle que soit la méthode que vous choisissez, après une restauration de votre serveur , vous devez supprimer manuellement le fichier db_backup_sync situé dans le chemin de la base de données .

trans-unit.source: Link a VSS Snapshot to a Directory in Command Line Mode

seg-source.mrk: Link a VSS Snapshot to a Directory in Command Line Mode

target.mrk: Lier un snapshot VSS à un répertoire en mode commande

trans-unit.source: On the machine hosting the , launch the ade_admin command line interface by selecting Start > Programs > Atempo Deduplication Engine > Administration.

seg-source.mrk: On the machine hosting the , launch the ade_admin command line interface by selecting Start > Programs > Atempo Deduplication Engine > Administration.

target.mrk: Sur la machine hébergeant l', lancez l'interface de ligne de commande ade_admin en sélectionnant Démarrer > Programmes > Moteur de déduplication Atempo > Administration.

trans-unit.source: Run snap_list to obtain the list of available snapshots and select the snapshot you want to restore from.

seg-source.mrk: Run snap_list to obtain the list of available snapshots and select the snapshot you want to restore from.

target.mrk: Exécutez snap_list pour obtenir la liste des snapshots disponibles et sélectionnez le snapshot à partir duquel vous souhaitez restaurer.

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt from the Windows Start menu and go to the HyperStream_Snapshot directory of your HyperStream home directory.

seg-source.mrk: Open a command prompt from the Windows Start menu and go to the HyperStream_Snapshot directory of your HyperStream home directory.

target.mrk: Ouvrez une invite de commande dans le menu Démarrer de Windows et allez dans le répertoire HyperStream_Snapshot de votre répertoire racine HyperStream.

trans-unit.source: Run the following command to create a directory that will contain the snapshot:

seg-source.mrk: Run the following command to create a directory that will contain the snapshot:

target.mrk: Exécutez la commande suivante pour créer un répertoire qui contiendra le snapshot :

trans-unit.source: mkdir <directory_name>

seg-source.mrk: mkdir <directory_name>

target.mrk: mkdir <directory_name>

trans-unit.source: mkdir c:\mounted_snapshot

seg-source.mrk: mkdir c:\mounted_snapshot

target.mrk: mkdir c:\mounted_snapshot

trans-unit.source: Run the following command:

seg-source.mrk: Run the following command:

target.mrk: Exécutez la commande suivante:

trans-unit.source: mkjunction <VSS_Snapshot_Volume> <directory_name>

seg-source.mrk: mkjunction <VSS_Snapshot_Volume> <directory_name>

target.mrk: mkjunction <VSS_Snapshot_Volume> <directory_name>

trans-unit.source: mkjunction \\?\GLOBALROOT\Device\HarddiskVolumeShadowCopy25\ c:\mounted_snapshot

seg-source.mrk: mkjunction \\?\GLOBALROOT\Device\HarddiskVolumeShadowCopy25\ c:\mounted_snapshot

target.mrk: mkjunction \\?\GLOBALROOT\Device\HarddiskVolumeShadowCopy25\ c:\mounted_snapshot

trans-unit.source: The VSS snapshot is now linked to the specified directory. Browse this directory for the required files and directories and restore them to the original disk.

seg-source.mrk: The VSS snapshot is now linked to the specified directory.
Browse this directory for the required files and directories and restore them to the original disk.

target.mrk: Le snapshot VSS est maintenant lié au répertoire spécifié.
Parcourez ce répertoire pour trouver les fichiers et répertoires requis et restaurez-les sur le disque d'origine.

trans-unit.source: When you have finished restoring your data, delete the link created between the VSS snapshot and the directory. To do so, run this command:

seg-source.mrk: When you have finished restoring your data, delete the link created between the VSS snapshot and the directory.
To do so, run this command:

target.mrk: Lorsque vous avez terminé la restauration de vos données, supprimez le lien créé entre le snapshot VSS et le répertoire.
Pour ce faire, exécutez cette commande :

trans-unit.source: rmdir <directory_name>

seg-source.mrk: rmdir <directory_name>

target.mrk: rmdir <directory_name>

trans-unit.source: rmdir c:\mounted_snapshot

seg-source.mrk: rmdir c:\mounted_snapshot

target.mrk: rmdir c:\mounted_snapshot

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the method you choose, after a restore of your server, you need to manually remove the file db_backup_sync located in the database path.

seg-source.mrk: Regardless of the method you choose, after a restore of your server, you need to manually remove the file db_backup_sync located in the database path.

target.mrk: Quelle que soit la méthode que vous choisissez, après une restauration de votre serveur , vous devez supprimer manuellement le fichier db_backup_sync situé dans le chemin de la base de données .

trans-unit.source: Revert an entire disk from a VSS snapshot

seg-source.mrk: Revert an entire disk from a VSS snapshot

target.mrk: Effectuer un revert dun disque entier depuis un snapshot VSS

trans-unit.source: Shut down any application running on the disk to restore, including the Atempo <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and Atempo HyperStream Snapshot services.

seg-source.mrk: Shut down any application running on the disk to restore, including the Atempo <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and Atempo HyperStream Snapshot services.

target.mrk: Arrêtez toute application exécutée sur le disque à restaurer, y compris les services Atempo <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et Snapshot Atempo HyperStream.

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt from the Windows Start menu and go to the HyperStream_Snapshot directory of your HyperStream home directory.

seg-source.mrk: Open a command prompt from the Windows Start menu and go to the HyperStream_Snapshot directory of your HyperStream home directory.

target.mrk: Ouvrez une invite de commande dans le menu Démarrer de Windows et accédez au répertoire HyperStream_Snapshot de votre répertoire racine HyperStream.

trans-unit.source: Run this command:

seg-source.mrk: Run this command:

target.mrk: Exécutez cette commande :

trans-unit.source: vssadmin revert shadow /shadow=<{snapshot ID}>

seg-source.mrk: vssadmin revert shadow /shadow=<{snapshot ID}>

target.mrk: vssadmin revert shadow /shadow=<{snapshot ID}>

trans-unit.source: vssadmin revert shadow /shadow={b19d5395-a7f9-494e-9670-54699bc9e556}

seg-source.mrk: vssadmin revert shadow /shadow={b19d5395-a7f9-494e-9670-54699bc9e556}

target.mrk: vssadmin revert shadow /shadow={b19d5395-a7f9-494e-9670-54699bc9e556}

trans-unit.source: The disk has been reverted to the state when the VSS snapshot was taken.

seg-source.mrk: The disk has been reverted to the state when the VSS snapshot was taken.

target.mrk: Le disque a été remis à l'état où il se trouvait lorsque le snapshot VSS a été pris.

trans-unit.source: You may add the /forcedismount parameter at the end of the command to force the unlocking of all data located on the disk.

seg-source.mrk: You may add the /forcedismount parameter at the end of the command to force the unlocking of all data located on the disk.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez ajouter le paramètre /forcedismount à la fin de la commande pour forcer le déverrouillage de toutes les données situées sur le disque.

trans-unit.source: Repeat this operation for all the other disks containing HyperStream data to restore. Every disk must be reverted individually.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat this operation for all the other disks containing HyperStream data to restore.
Every disk must be reverted individually.

target.mrk: Répétez cette opération pour tous les autres disques contenant des données HyperStream à restaurer.
Chaque disque doit subir un revert individuel.
